Description: Arm from a life-size wooden figure; painted detail on a layer of gesso(worn) including a bracelet at the wrist; two tenons at the shoulder.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Ryan 1988 / The Archaeological Excavations of David George Hogarth at Asyut, Egypt 1906/7 (20)
